title: The Bhungroo (Straw) - An Intervention for  water logging and irrigation in saline soils

tasks.task: Farming and land management with traditional irrigation systems.
subtasks: Understanding water resources for agricultural use.
Calculating water needs and frequency for crops.
Assessing the size of catchment areas and their impact on irrigation.
Collaborative decision-making for irrigation scheduling among community members.
Adjusting cropping patterns based on available resources and new irrigation methods.
Enhancing livestock production through alternative income sources.
Reviewing the economic benefits of adopting bhoongru systems.
Tracking seasons and crop cycles associated with traditional irrigation practices.
Monitoring fuel consumption and costs for irrigation pumping.
